name: Crab Cakes with Curried Yogurt Sauce
author: KEISHADRAILEY
summary: Crab cakes are a traditional East Coast flavor; this recipe, however, gives them a Middle Eastern spin!!! They are moist and flavorful alone, but add the sauce, and WOW!
ingredients: 2 cups low sodium buttery round crackers, crushed
Old Bay Seasoning TM to taste
directions: In a small bowl, mix together 1/4 cup mayonnaise and yogurt
Season with curry powder, chile pepper, and garlic powder
Cover and chill at least 30 minutes
In a separate bowl, toss together the green onion, jalapeno, garlic, bread crumbs, and 1/2 the crackers
Mix in the egg, 1/2 cup mayonnaise, mustard, Worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, and   seasoning
Form the mixture into 6 cakes and evenly coat with the remaining bread crumbs
Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat
Cook each cake about 5 minutes on each side, until heated through and golden brown
Serve with the chilled sauce mixture
